controllers

Class Users

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Controller
      • controllers.Users
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport

    public class Users
extends play.mvc.Controller
    The Users controller handles all events concerning the User model object. This includes Twitter login, creation and deletion of guest user records in the database and helper methods to check the state of the current User.

    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public static void authenticate()
        Handles all Twitter login events: - Unkonwn user tries to log in -> redirect to Twitter authorization page - OAuth callback (from Twitter API) -> process twitter api data

      • getUser

        public static User getUser()
        Get the current User identified by session. If the user is not logged in you will receive a guest user, which may be accessed by others. To check if a user is known (i.e. not a guest) call isGuest().

      • isGuest

        public static boolean isGuest(User usr)
        Use this to check if a User is known or just a guest

      • authorizeRequestSent

        public static boolean authorizeRequestSent(User usr)
        Utility mehtods to check if a user user was redirected to the twitter authorization page but we have not processed the twitter api callback data yet.
        Parameters:
        usr -
        Returns:
